data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a JSON bin by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a stored JSON bin by its unique identifier. Returns the complete JSON object stored in the bin. Requires the bin ID as a path parameter.
data.reasoning: Summary is vague ('Return' is passive). Description is completely missing. Added clarity about what is being retrieved (JSON bin by ID), what is returned (complete JSON object), and input requirements (bin ID parameter) for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'put_/bin/{id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary lacks specificity about full replacement semantics. Description is missing entirely. Added details about full replacement behavior (vs partial), required inputs (bin ID and JSON payload), return value, and side effects (complete data overwrite) for AI agents to distinguish from PATCH.

data.description_suggestion: Replaces the entire contents of a JSON bin with new data. Requires the bin ID as a path parameter and a JSON payload in the request body. Returns the updated bin. This operation performs a full replacement - existing data is completely overwritten.
data.reasoning: Summary lacks specificity about full replacement semantics. Description is missing entirely. Added details about full replacement behavior (vs partial), required inputs (bin ID and JSON payload), return value, and side effects (complete data overwrite) for AI agents to distinguish from PATCH.

message: Operation 'patch_/bin/{id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary mentions JSON Merge Patch but lacks clarity on what this means for AI agents. Description is missing entirely. Added explanation of RFC 7386 standard, clarified input requirements (bin ID and patch document), and explicitly stated the merge behavior (preservation of unmodified fields) to help AI agents understand when to use PATCH vs PUT.

data.current_summary: Partially update a json bin with JSON Merge Patch
data.summary_suggestion: Partially update JSON bin using merge patch
data.description_suggestion: Partially updates a JSON bin using JSON Merge Patch (RFC 7386). Requires the bin ID as a path parameter and a JSON patch document in the request body. Only provided fields are modified; existing fields not in the patch are preserved. Returns the updated bin.
data.reasoning: Summary mentions JSON Merge Patch but lacks clarity on what this means for AI agents. Description is missing entirely. Added explanation of RFC 7386 standard, clarified input requirements (bin ID and patch document), and explicitly stated the merge behavior (preservation of unmodified fields) to help AI agents understand when to use PATCH vs PUT.

data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a JSON bin and all its contents. Requires the bin ID as a path parameter. This operation cannot be undone. Returns a deletion confirmation status.
data.reasoning: Summary lacks emphasis on permanence. Description is completely missing.
